About.title: About YifanTech
description_list: Headquartered in Beijing, YifanTech delivers expert language solutions tailored for businesses navigating international markets. Our full range of services includes translation, interpretation, localization, proofreading, editing, and cultural consulting, designed to bridge communication gaps seamlessly.

We proudly collaborate with a curated team of over 120 elite linguists, graduates from top universities worldwide, fluent in more than 30 languages. This expertise allows us to meet the diverse needs of both international clients entering China and Chinese companies expanding globally.

Our dedication to quality and confidentiality has earned us trust from leading corporations and listed companies across over 30 industries, making YifanTech a reliable partner for your global ambitions.

Services.title: Our Services
Services.brief: Comprehensive language solutions tailored to your needs

main_service_list.title: Translation
main_service_list.description: We deliver precision-crafted translation solutions tailored to the specific terminology and regulatory requirements of your industry. Our expertise covers a wide range of sectors, including legal and notary services, finance, energy, biomedical sciences, machinery manufacturing, IT and digital media, as well as entertainment and tourism. We ensure your message is not only accurate, but also perfectly suited for your target audience.

main_service_list.title: Interpreting
main_service_list.description: We facilitate seamless communication with professional interpreting services tailored to any setting. Whether you need simultaneous, consecutive, escort, or whispered interpreting, our experts ensure your message is delivered accurately and effectively.

main_service_list.title: Language Consulting and International Communication
main_service_list.description: Go beyond translation and ensure your brand's voice resonates in every market. Our consulting service provides the cultural insights and strategic guidance you need to adapt your messaging, strengthen your brand identity, and optimize your digital content for a global audience. We help you navigate cultural nuances to build trust and forge genuine connections.

Expertise.title: ESG & Sustainability Reporting
description_list: In a world where sustainability has become a key driver of business success, our expertise lies in translating the intricate language of sustainability into compelling narratives. Specializing in ESG and CSR reporting, we serve as your partner in full impact disclosures, ensuring your story resonates with clarity and authority.

Our linguists are not just translators; they are specialists who navigate the complexities of global regulatory frameworks and expectations set by leading rating agencies such as MSCI and SASB. We meticulously align your terminology with recognized disclosure standards like GRI and TCFD, guaranteeing not only linguistic accuracy but also strategic compliance.

In today's competitive landscape, the narrative surrounding your sustainability efforts is integral to your influence and brand equity. We empower you to articulate this narrative with precision and credibility, helping you not only meet regulatory requirements but also exceed them, establishing your organization as a leader in your industry.

Cases.title: Your Sector-Specific ESG Communication Partner
Cases.brief: We deliver industry-leading ESG translation and communications, precision-engineered for the unique challenges of your sector. Chosen by forward-thinking companies for our reliable, customized approach, we provide the strategic support you need to elevate your sustainability narrative and build stakeholder trust.

industries.name: Internet
industries.title: ESG for the Digital Frontier

Our expertise ensures your reports highlight commitment to employee well-being, supply chain integrity, and environmental stewardship, strengthening your competitiveness in the global sustainable value chain.
